"Scanning process completed, replicating...." The pod hummed softly as it r=
eadied the protoform inside fot its new form. "Replication completed." tha =
pod said as the hatch popped open and hot steam rose into the frigid air. A=
 large white arctic wolf jumped from the pod and howled to the winds.......=


Name: Longhunter
Alegeiance: Maximal
Function: Remote Scout/ Colony estab=
lishment

Motto: "The ability to survive in hostile environments is the hal=
lmark of a great hunter..."

Beast Mode: Large, white arctic wolf

Robot ap=
pearance: Female, polished steel with gunmetal highlights.

STATS:

Strengt=
h: 7.0
Intelligence: 8.8
Speed: 8.0
Endurance: 9.5
Rank: 4.3
Courage: 8.4
F=
irepower: 7.9
Skill: 10.0

Prolouge:
An enigamtic warrior, Longhunter noram=
lly stands alone. She is a very steadfast and loyal warrior but still not m=
uch is known about this underspoken and rarely seen Maximal. Some of the ot=
her Maximals find her silence and stealth very disconcerting. Her primary f=
unction is remote scouting, but Maximal Command has assigned her to explora=
tion missions where Cybertronian colonization is a possiblity. The commande=
rs of these missions found her insubordiate and had to control, but her loy=
alty to her comarades and high level of skill make up for this. Although He=
r rank is low, she is considered one of the best explorers on Cybertron.

W=
eapons:
1 twin barreled Quasar blaster
1 plasma sword sheathed in right for=
earm
2 Cybertonium/Energon limpet mines contained in left forearm
Quadrilli=
um teeth and claws in Beast Mode with the ability to "lockjaw" onto any tar=
get.

Special Attributes:
Phased ELR subspace communication array capable o=
f near orbit range

Quadrillium Superstructure for robot mode gives longhun=
ter amazing resilliance and somewhat dampens Energon interferance

All-weat=
her Cartographic sensors with TRAP memory enables mapping and instant recal=
l of any area in any climate and measures the geosphere for any instability=
.

~Longhunter
